text: Hey all! I'm new here trying to set up a drag & drop template for my client. I was able to easily set up a drag & drop email template following the steps here <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-marketing-emails-in-the-drag-and-drop-email-editor>, but when I go to the email editor itself to test a new email creation, I don't actually see any drag & drop options, just standard modules!
linking over to other thread with ongoing conversation around this: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CDSFETF5X/p1577999086016400>
